details.purpose: ToolNTool is a concept project that demonstrates the usefulness of share economies with tools. Users who create an account are able to connect with other users to lend or borrow their tools.
details.role: My main responsibilities for this project were creating the backend, implementing Passport.js for authentication, and handling APIs with and without Redux. Outside the code, I was also responsible for the Git repository as well as the heroku deployment.

details.purpose: MoneyRocket is a data project that takes in data on a user's spending habits and displays the data so a user can visually track their spending.
details.role: My main responsibilities for this project included implementing D3 to handle data logic and Passport for authentication. I also handled conflicts and merging for our Git reposit.

details.purpose: I created this trivia game to test classes, timers, and game logic with Javascript. It features score tracking, question difficulty, timers, confirmations, audio, and mobile responsiveness
